remarks: If two complex numbers are equal, their difference is zero.  Consequence of ~ subeq0ad .  Converse of ~ subeq0d .  Contrapositive of ~ subne0ad .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
subeq0bd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
subeq0bd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
subeq0bd $p |- ( ph -> ( A - B ) = 0 ) $.
